It might be more comfortable

Stretch marks
These are pink or purplish lines 
which usually occur on your 
abdomen or sometimes on 
your upper thighs or breasts. 
Some women get them, some 
don’t. It depends on your skin 
type.
Some people’s skin is more 
elastic. You are more likely 
to get stretch marks if your 
weight gain is more than 
average. It is very doubtful
